Package view

Class WordleTextView

java.lang.Object
view.WordleTextView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class WordleTextView extends Object implements Observer
The text based UI. This class contains methods to display what the user would see to interact with the controller. ultimately, this is what the user sees. This uses the Observer/Observable design patter with the MVC design architecture.
Author:
Leighanna Pipatanangkura

    • playGame

      private void playGame(WordleController controller, Scanner in)
      Runs the game loop and directs the data from the user to the controller.
      Parameters:
      controller - handles the guesses the user enters and keeps track of their progress.
      scanner - continuously seeks for the user input when needed.

    • createGame

      private WordleController createGame() throws IOException
      Initializes the controller and model when the game is started.
      Returns:
      the controller of the game which is what the user interacts with.
      Throws:
      IOException - throws exception if the controller/model cannot find the dictionary.
